itemDisplayName: Create a CDN Endpoint with cache override through Rules
description: This template creates a CDN Profile and a CDN Endpoint with a user specified origin and all of our most commonly used settings on CDN. This template also configures rules engine with a path based rule and overrides cache expiration.
summary: Create a CDN Profile, a CDN Endpoint with a user defined origin and recommended settings. This template also configures rules engine with a path based rule and overrides cache expiration.
